DOC.brief_summary: The purpose randomize intervention study investigate effect biological mechanism supervise 12-week progressive resistance training fatigue quality life breast cancer patient chemotherapy . To determine effect exercise beyond potential psychosocial effect due attention trainer group support , patient control group comparable training schedule ( i.e . 60 min , twice week , 12 week ) relaxation training ( Jacobsen method ) .
DOC.brief_title: Progressive Resistance Training Versus Relaxation Breast Cancer Patients During Chemotherapy : Biological Mechanisms Effects Fatigue Quality Life
DOC.criteria: breast cancer patient lumpectomy mastectomy , stage IIII adjuvant chemotherapy BMI least 18 contraindication exercise radiotherapy intervention period
